name: E-Cracs
description:
A simple and fun wave defense platformer with several types of enemies and pixelated graphics.

Features:

>Fast paced wave defense action.

>4 types of enemies, each with different abilities.

>15 waves with an increasing difficulty curve and an infinite randomly generated 16th wave.

>An easter egg about a certain man that wears a flannel. (Maybe some people will get it :P)

Controls:

>Arrow keys to move.

>Z to jump.

>X to shoot.

>R to restart.

>Esc to exit the game.
